body_html: Without batch_first, input dimensions are [seq_length, batch_size, num_features]. batch_first switches the seq_length and batch_size for input. Hidden dimension is [num_layers * num_directions, batch, hidden_size], it is for the last step in a sequence, so seq_length dimension is squeezed out for hidden. Since semantically hidden dimensions are different from input dimensions, it is unclear why batch_first switch should affect them.
